title: Ramen World
text: Ramen Rating package. creator package Phuong Thanh Trinh. data used assessment ramen_rating.csv data collected Ramen Rater. aim package provide users information regarding different ramen reviews different factors styles can change customers’ ratings particular ramen brand.

title: Ramen World
text: data used assessment ramen_rating.csv data set, originated Ramen Rater - product review website ramen enthusiast. dataset provides 3,000 reviews 400 ramen brands selected countries across globe. record data set represents single ramen review. dataset contains 6 variables, including: 4 categorical variables: brand: Brand ramen variety: ramen variety, e.g., flavor, style, ingredient style: Style container (cup, pack, tray) country: Origin country ramen brand 2 numeric variables: review_number: Ramen review number stars: Rating ramen ranging 0-5 (5 best, 0 worst)

title: Ramen World
text: 7 functions included package: get_average Get average ratings get_best_style Get highest varieties get_pct Get good bad ramen country get_ramen_rating Get ramen_rating dataset get_rank Rank highest average rate get_table Get ramen_rating dataset tabular format run_app Get shiny app ramen rating dataset

title: Authors and Citation
text: Phuong Trinh. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Trinh P (2022). ramenreview: beginners' guild ramen lovers. R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ramenreview: A beginners' guild for ramen lovers},   author = {Phuong Trinh},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

title: A beginners' guild for ramen lovers
text: goal ramenreview package provide information different varieties ramen world. package also gives food lovers, especially ramen enthusiasts, ideas best ramen world. detailed information package can found .

title: A beginners' guild for ramen lovers
text: can install development version ramenreview GitHub :

title: A beginners' guild for ramen lovers
text: guidline use ramenreview package: Load library Exploring functions get_ramen_rating(): Get ramen_rating dataset function return tibble including 3180 rows 6 columns, shown : get_table(): Get ramen_rating dataset tabular format function return tidy formatted table comprising 4 summary statistics ramen different countries.  get_average(): Get average ratings function produce boxplot showing averaging ratings country, across continents. passing argument “continents”, plot turn filter plot according continents chosen. example,get_average(continents = "Asia") return result like :  get_pct() Get good bad ramen country function generate plot showing associated proportion good bad ramen nation.  get_best_style(): Get highest varieties function return description number ramen variations available one style. Example shown follow: get_rank(): Rank highest average rate function help compute ranking average rate ramen style. run_app(): Get shiny app ramen rating dataset
code: library(ramenreview) get_ramen_rating() ## Rows: 3180 Columns: 6 ## ── Column specification ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── ## Delimiter: "," ## chr (4): brand, variety, style, country ## dbl (2): review_number, stars ##  ## ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data. ## ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.  ## # A tibble: 3,180 × 7 ##    review_number brand           variety             style country stars conti…¹ ##            <dbl> <chr>           <chr>               <chr> <chr>   <dbl> <chr>   ##  1          3180 Yum Yum         Tem Tem Tom Yum Mo… Cup   Thaila…  3.75 Asia    ##  2          3179 Nagatanien      tom Yum Kung Rice … Pack  Japan    2    Asia    ##  3          3178 Acecook         Kelp Broth Shio Ra… Cup   Japan    2.5  Asia    ##  4          3177 Maison de Coree Ramen Gout Coco Po… Cup   France   3.75 Europe  ##  5          3176 Maruchan        Gotsumori Shio Yak… Tray  Japan    5    Asia    ##  6          3175 Myojo           Chukazanmai Tantan… Cup   Japan    3.5  Asia    ##  7          3174 TIEasy          Sesame Sauce Handm… Pack  Taiwan   3.75 Asia    ##  8          3173 Sapporo Ichiban Momosan Ramen Tonk… Pack  United…  5    America ##  9          3172 Samlip          Hi-Myon Katsuo Udon Pack  Republ…  3.5  <NA>    ## 10          3171 Doll            Bowl Noodle Satay … Bowl  China    4.25 Asia    ## # … with 3,170 more rows, and abbreviated variable name ¹​continent get_table() # generate plot showing five summary values for countries located in Asia get_average(continents = "Asia") get_pct(names = "Australia") # get the total number of ramen varieties in Bowl style get_best_style(styles = "Bowl") ## [1] "There are 612 variations available in this style!" # Get rank of ramen in Cup style get_rank(styles = "Cup") ## [1] "This style ranks 8th among all styles!"
